title: Why Charismatic Christians need Jordan Peterson & John Vervaeke
description:
Sam from the Transfigured YouTube Channel & Podcast, reached out to talk with me about my recent public exploration of the work of John Vervaeke and how it may have points of resonance with Christian theology.
We also talk for a bit about my background as a Charismatic, Jordan Peterson (and why he needs to unplug from The Culture War Matrix), science and theology, and more.

While I respectfully disagree with Sam on his unitarian theology, he's a thoughtful dialogue partner with many common points of interests. Sam is shared friend of Paul Vander Klay who I've had several public conversations with.
You can find his "Transfigured" podcast here:
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/transfigured/id1559094234
